entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Tofino
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tofino Airport 8:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: ESE 22 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Wet snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to wet snow at times mixed with rain this evening and ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm inland. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of hail and thunderstorms. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections early in the morning. Wind becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
